name: Partner
description: Represents a partner, such as a distributor or reseller.
summary:
The `Partner` object in Salesforce is characterized by the following attributes:

1. **Id**: A unique identifier for the partner record (type: id).
2. **OpportunityId**: A reference to the associated opportunity (type: reference).
3. **AccountFromId**: A reference to the account from which the partner relationship originates (type: reference).
4. **AccountToId**: A reference to the account to which the partner relationship points (type: reference).
5. **Role**: The role of the partner in the relationship (type: picklist).
6. **IsPrimary**: Indicates whether the partner is the primary partner (type: boolean).
7. **CreatedDate**: The date and time when the partner record was created (type: datetime).
8. **CreatedById**: A reference to the user who created the partner record (type: reference).
9. **LastModifiedDate**: The date and time when the partner record was last modified (type: datetime).
10. **LastModifiedById**: A reference to the user who last modified the partner record (type: reference).
11. **SystemModstamp**: The date and time when the partner record was last modified by the system (type: datetime).
12. **IsDeleted**: Indicates whether the partner record has been deleted (type: boolean).
13. **ReversePartnerId**: A reference to the reverse partner record (type: reference).

These attributes collectively define the structure and relationships of the `Partner` object within the Salesforce application.
label: Partner
